inclusion.criterion: A study size for a before-after comparison, with 2017 as the "before" period and 2020 as the "after" period has been calculated
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: In our healthcare system, the average CC ratio was 65% in 2017, whereas the ERC guidelines recommend a minimum of 60%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: With the use of the 2020 algorithm, for CA with shockable rhythm, the CC ratio is expected to decrease slightly, as the analyses become closer in time
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: It is assumed a CCratio in 2020 being "equivalent" to 2017 (65%) and consider that a difference in CCratio rate as large as 10% in favor of the 2017 period still allows the new algorithm to be non-inferior (delta = 0.1)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The sample size calculation is based on an 80% power to confirm non-inferiority and a one-sided confidence level of 97.5%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: As a result, the number of subjects to be included in each period is 282, i.e., six months of observation in each period
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The sponsor has the responsibility to report, to the national health authority, any serious and unexpected adverse events attributable to the new AED algorithm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A full report on the risks, the description of incidents, accidents and adverse events will be the subject of a chapter in the results section and also in the discussion
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Funding for the study is provided by the Paris Fire Brigade (promoter, following acceptance of the survey under French policy for clinical research projects)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The study will report on the CC fraction of an AED algorithm designed to analyze "under CC." -Non-traumatic OHCA in adults, treated by a BLS team and connected to an AED equipped either with the 2017 or with the 2020 algorithm
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of AED in a pediatric mode
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patient already connected to another defibrillator at the arrival of the BLS Team
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No shock administration within the first 10 minutes after the first analysis has started.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Surviving patients' opposition to the use of their data.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with unreadable electrocardiographic or impedance data.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of CAD, prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after negative work-up for syncope with implantation of cardiac monitoring device.
